title: Suite upgrade fails due to hardware resource shortage
content:
You fail to upgrade the suite to this release. Additionally, you can find the following error in the <global-volume>/logs/update/deployer.log (for example: /var/vols/itom/global-volume/logs/update/deployer.log) file:

Excepion: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

The following figure shows an example.


Root cause

The suite system doesn't have enough hardware resources. 

Solution

  1. Add hardware resources according to the suite sizing guide of this release. 
  2. Retry the suite version update.
